original_title: The Lightbringers: the Emissaries of Jahbulon
overview: All over the world there are people, who call themselves freemasons and believe they are spreading the light, but they are actually very much afraid of the light. This film tells about how the Emissaries of Jahbulon spread it around themselves and how it affects us.
title: The Lightbringers: the Emissaries of Jahbulon
